chapters.title: Prologue: Fortress of the Light
chapters.info: Lord Captain Geofram Bornhald, p. 15 (3)—Lord Captain of the thousand or so Whitecloaks who died at Falme. He died with his men. He was the commander of the troops who captured Perrin and Egwene; when Perrin killed some of his men, Bornhald vowed to take Perrin back to Amador to be hanged. Despite this, he may have been one of the few Whitecloaks who saw beyond the propaganda of the Children, using his own wisdom to judge people instead of insisting everyone not in white cloaks was in league with the Shadow. See also Bornhald, Dain.
